name: FazWaz Pte Ltd.
description: Operator of a property search portal designed to find desirable properties in a hassle-free manner. The company's portal uses the latest technologies and up-to-date market data to capture leads, analyze trends and investment opportunities quickly scale across new markets, enabling customers to find properties of their choice in a hassle-free manner.
